original_text: But they would not say anything. So Jesus took the sick man and he made him well again. Then he let him go away.
korean_text: 그들이 잠잠하거늘 예수께서 그 사람을 데려다가 고쳐 보내시고

sentences.original_text: But they would not say anything.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 아무 말도 하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So Jesus took the sick man
and he made him well again.
Then he let him go away.
